rule.name: EAP_RunConfiguration_CheckProcessingWeekdays
rule.description: Contains rule to check processing weekdays for run configurations
rule.definition:
a!localVariables( local!runconfigs: if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!processId), {},#"_a-0000e4c3-ab68-8000-5250-1bef901bef90_11827"( processId: ri!processId )), local!nonWOrkingDayData: if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!calendarId), {}, #"_a-0000e4cd-1af4-8000-5255-1bef901bef90_125445"( calendarId: ri!calendarId, isActive: 1 )), local!masterLookup: if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(index(local!runconfigs,"processing_weekdays",{})), {}, #"_a-0000e4c3-ab68-8000-5250-1bef901bef90_7827"( categoryGroup: #"_a-0000e4c3-ab68-8000-5250-1bef901bef90_10373"[3], type: #"_a-0000e4cd-1af4-8000-5255-1bef901bef90_108743"[2], label: split(index(local!runconfigs,"processing_weekdays",{}),",")
)), local!data: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: local!masterLookup, expression: contains( tointeger(index(local!nonWOrkingDayData,"non_working_day",{})), tointeger(index(fv!item,"code",{})) )), if(contains( toboolean(local!data), true() ), "This calendar can not be selected as processing weekday in run configuration is non working day in this calendar. Please modify the run configuration first.", "") )
